messages.title: My pledge to you...
messages.content: Whatever is happening nationally, Brighton is different. In our city, we are proud to be different: creative, compassionate and brave. If you elect me, I pledge to represent these values in Parliament again. Trust my track record: standing up for Brighton on fighting cuts, saving the NHS, capping rents, reducing rail fares and urgent action on climate change. If you want to make the difference, then please vote for it.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The latest independent poll puts Caroline ahead by 10%... National polls consistently point to a Parliament with no party winning an overall majority, so smaller parties will have more influence. A vote for Caroline on 7th May is the best way to keep the Tories out of Government, to make Labour bolder, and have a great local MP.

leaflet.personalStatement: Whatever is happening nationally, Brighton is different. In our city, we are proud to be different: creative, compassionate and brave.
